abstract.para: Use this procedure to remove one &sbd; device from a cluster with multiple &sbd; devices configured. You cannot use this method if there is only one &sbd; device configured.

topic.para: TODO: Add cluster restart warning when available.

listitem.para: Disk-based &sbd; is configured with more than one device.

topic.para: Perform this procedure on only one node in the cluster:

step.para: Log in either as the &rootuser; user or as a user with sudo privileges.
Check which devices are already configured for use with &sbd;:
The output shows multiple device IDs in the SBD_DEVICE line.
Remove one device from the &sbd; configuration:

The script removes the device, updates the &sbd; configuration file, and checks whether it is safe to restart the cluster services automatically. If any non-&stonith; resources are running, the script warns you to restart the cluster services manually.
